name: facturas.app
description: facturas.app = Invoice managment app  (nodejs + express + graphql + mongodb)

scripts.db-reload: npm run db-clean && npm run db-populate
scripts.db-populate: mongo facturita --eval "db.invoice.createIndex({ code: 'text', description: 'text', paymentForm: 'text', amount: 'text'}, { default_language: 'es' })" && mongo facturita --eval "db.person.createIndex({ name: 'text', taxNumber: 'text', address: 'text' }, { default_language: 'es' })" && node scripts/db-populate.js

author: Jakub Michal Zawada @FeedYourWeb.com
